task.title: Comparing revisions between commits
task.shortdesc: To see what exactly changed between two previously commited versions of a file, you can compare the version in the currently selected commit with its previous version.

step.cmd: From the view toolbar, open the history of the current branch.
In the commit log, select the commit that you want to see the details of.
In the list of commited changes, right click-click a file and click Compare with previous version.
